alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 9:16PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN EDDY AND NORTHWESTERN CULBERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/... At 1016 PM CDT/916 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Springs, Guadalupe Mountains National Park, McKittrick Canyon, and Carlsbad Caverns National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
